name: Minute
description:
Embark on an action pack steampunk journey like no other! Plunge into a mesmerizing fantasy world where gears spin, steam hisses, and brass contraptions come to life! Minute is a 3D action platformer where you'll play as a brave wind-up toy named Tink, a magical steampunk automaton toy crafted by a skilled tinkerer who embarks on a perilous journey in his creator's workshop.

Experience a whimsical tale of courage, discovery, and self growth as you venture through the maze of whirling cogs and ticking clocks. Hone your combat skills as you challenge mischievous adversaries who get in your way. Master your abilities to overcome an abundance of expected obstacles and unlock hidden routes as you uncover the mysteries behind this clockwork world. Beat up gangster bugs, avoid nasty falls and scale the heights of a workshed. Embrace a heartfelt and soul-stirring story where narrative and gameplay weave into a uniquely metaphorical experience.



  • Custom Combat Experience: Experiment with attack patterns as you fight through the workshop.
  • Explore A Open Clockwork World: Dash, jump and bounce with your trusty key.
  • Uncover the mysteries: What is your purpose? Who created you? Where are they now?



This game was developed as a student project at DigiPen Institute of Technology and was created for educational purposes only. Please check out our publisher page for more information.
